name: nbbn

stmt.origin: 3bitrri(wb(wn(w0), w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)), wb(w0, wn(w1)), wb(w1, wn(w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wb(wn(w0), w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wb(w0, wn(w1)))
-| wb(wb(w0, wn(w1)), wb(w1, wn(w0)))
-| wb(wb(w1, wn(w0)), wb(wn(w0), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wb(wn(w0), w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))

-| wb(wb(w0, wn(w1)), wb(w1, wn(w0)))
-| wb(wb(w1, wn(w0)), wb(wn(w0), w1))

|- wb(wb(wn(w0), w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wb(w0, wn(w1)), wb(w1, wn(w0)))

comment: Move negation outside of biconditional. Compare Theorem *5.18 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 124. (Contributed by NM, 27-Jun-2002.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 20-Sep-2013.)
